meanings: fall a victim to a theft

vlive.korean: 차에 있는 물건이 도난당했나? Did the stuff in our car get stolen? 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [WekiMeki 위키미키 모해?] EP38
vlive.english: Did the stuff in our car get stolen?

vlive.korean: 차에 있는 물건이 도난당했나? Did the stuff in our car get stolen? 듣기 View video 모해 MOHAE : [WekiMeki 위키미키 모해?] EP37
vlive.english: Did the stuff in our car get stolen?

vlive.korean: 이렇게 트로피를... - 트로피 안 와요? - 트로피 도난 당했어요! Like this.. - Why isn't the trophy coming? - The trophy is stolen! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 세븐틴의 Oh My HALLOWEEN!
vlive.english: Like this.. - Why isn't the trophy coming? - The trophy is stolen!

vlive.korean: 이 '황제지보 도난 사건'을. "The Robbery of Hwangjejibo." 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [악동탐정스] 남주X형섭X선호 500만 감사 악탐스 코멘터리
아니야. 우리 도난으로 오해받아. Don't. Sales rep might think we're stealing. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [콩슈니 Kongsueni SHOW] 샤넬 신제품 런칭행사 즐기기! Let's go to Chanel's launching PARTY Let's play in Hongdae
vlive.english: Don't. Sales rep might think we're stealing.

examples.korean: The burglar alarm is activated by movement. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 도난 경보기는 움직임이 감지되면 작동된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The burglar alarm is activated by movement. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The burglar alarm should be professionally installed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도난 경보 장치는 전문가가 설치해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The burglar alarm should be professionally installed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Family photos spanning five generations were stolen. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다섯 세대에 걸치는 가족 사진이 도난당했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Family photos spanning five generations were stolen. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Lock up any valuables. Things tend to walk here. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 귀중품들은 (금고 등에) 잘 넣어 두세요. 물건들이 없어지는[도난이 되는] 경향이 있으니까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lock up any valuables. Things tend to walk here. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His wallet had been rifled. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 지갑은 도난당한 상태였다[도난당하고 없었다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His wallet had been rifled. Add to Wordbook
